work.name: University of Rochester
work.summary:
Directed a diverse cohort of 12 students, allocating 6 hours weekly to instruct on data structures, algorithms, and Java. Addressed over 100+ queries, supplementing with personalized tutoring to solidify comprehension. Resulting in a 20% average grade increase, successfully aiding their academic progress.
Engineered interactive learning environments, catalyzing significant enhancements in students’ analytical thinking and problem-solving capabilities. Facilitated in-class group discussions and peer-to-peer learning.
Master educational theory and techniques. Engaged in educational research and experiments related to study breaks, conducted experiments to elevate learning efficiency, and refined pedagogical strategies.

work.name: Carnegie Mellon University in Qatar
work.summary:
Evaluated six different Bert models in preliminary experiments, contributing to methodological advancements.
Managed, labeled, and cleaned over 2,000 data points for LLM, enhancing model performance by 10%.
Utilized Chat GPT as a comparative baseline, aiding in benchmarking model efficacy and accuracy.
Writing sample code for model coding ability evaluation, translating a standard test with 100+ entries into a functional programming language.

work.name: Litu Education
work.summary:
Assisted 10+ students in AP Calculus, Computer Science, and SAT, leading to a 20% average grade increase.
Developed course schedules, created engaging promotional content with over 1k views, and authored a 100-page vocabulary guide with personal memorization tips. Preparing teaching materials and practice questions.
Experimenting brings AI into the classroom by using AI to generate questions for English language learning and provide writing advice, leading to a 500% increase in teaching and grading efficacy.

work.name: Shenzhen Highschool Association Union
work.summary: Developed high-impact social media articles with 2.5k+ views and orchestrated a large-scale talent show, drawing 2k+ attendees, with direct involvement in performance coordination. Find sponsors and organize the event.

volunteer.summary: Taking a trip to Heyuan, China, a small city in Guangdong province, and taking a 2-week long assistant teaching position in a special school for students with disabilities. We conduct experimental teaching focusing on art creation with a combination of modern technology, such as a smart classroom projection system, to explore the potential of students with disabilities and how can such skill help them get a job in the future.

education.institution: John S. Burke Catholic High School
